# Introduction

Take 10 minutes to:

  1. Load the data
  2. Review the data
  3. Determine the response variable
  4. Pick an explanatory variable
  5. Make a clean dataset that has only your response and explanatory variable and has removed bad data (using `filter()` and `select()`)
  6. Make a graph that visualizes the relationship between the 2



```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(mosaic)
library(rio)
library(car)

olympics <- read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/byuistats/Math221D_Course/refs/heads/main/Data/Olympics.csv')

olympics %>%
  select(Name, Medal) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  table()

```
